scripts.prepare: cp packages/background/background.js build/ && cp public/* build && cp -r packages/popup/build/* build/ && cp manifest.json build/ && cp icons/* build/ && bash ./copy_content_files.sh
scripts.build: npm run build -w popup && npm run build -w content
scripts.watch: concurrently 'npm run watch -w popup && npm run prepare' 'npm run watch -w content && npm run prepare'
